ValidationRule.description: Ensures that leave requests are submitted a minimum number of days in advance, as defined by a custom label.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR( ISNEW(), ISCHANGED(Start_Date__c) ), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Leave_Type__c, "Sick Leave")), (Start_Date__c - TODAY()) < 5 )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Leave requests must be submitted at least 5 days in advance.
